name: Rosie Schaap
bio: Rosie Schaap has been a bartender, a fortuneteller, a librarian at a paranormal society, an English teacher, an editor, a preacher, a community organizer, a manager of homeless shelters, and a ghostwriter for an inspirational magazine. Her work has been broadcast on the public radio show This American Life, and her book, Drinking With Men, a collection of true stories set in bars she's known and loved, will be published next year by Riverhead. She is a supporter of Tottenham Hotspur FC and the Netherlands National Football Team, and is a contributor to NPR's World Cup 2010 Blog.
